about.title: About This App
about.appGeneral: This app helps you prepare for job interviews in a structured and interactive way. You can track your progress, score your answers, and practice realistic questions tailored to your role.
about.appSecondary: Built using modern web technologies like React, Tailwind CSS, TanStack Router, and shadcn/ui, the app is designed for speed, simplicity, and user focus.
about.authorGeneral: Hi! I'm Andrii Telenko, a software engineer passionate about building clean, accessible, and AI-assisted tools that help people grow. I love React, serverless technologies, and UI/UX design.
about.authorSecondary: In my free time, I enjoy creating side projects, exploring tech trends, and spending time with my daughter.

welcome.title: Start Your New Journey with AI Interviews
welcome.subTitle: Practice, grow, get feedback, and prepare for your dream job.
